anya-e0104n9:98_1: Piṭṭhaṁ vaṭṭayamānaṁ viyāti thūlathūlato vivecanavasena nipphoṭiyamānaṁ saṇhaṁ saṇhaṁ piṭṭhacuṇṇaṁ viya.
anya-e0104n9:98_5: Yathā yathā hi vipassanābhāvanābalena tikkhā, visadā,
anya-e0104n9:98_8: Saṅkhāravicinaneti pavicayassa sikhāppattatāya saṅkhāresu viya tesaṁ vicinanepi udāsīnaṁ hutvā tividhānupassanāvasena
anya-e0104n9:98_10: “Sattadhā aṭṭhārasadhā”tiādinā vibhattāpi hi anupassanāpakārā aniccānupassanādīsveva tīsu antogadhāti
anya-e0104n9:98_11: matthakappattā vipassanā tāsaṁ eva vasena tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n9:99_7: anattānupassanābahulassa paññindriyanti tissannaṁ anupassanānaṁ vasena balavatarabhāvaṁ pattāni imāni
anya-e0104n9:99_10: Tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvanti ettha ke pana tayo vimokkhā,
anya-e0104n9:99_11: kāni vā tīṇi vimokkhamukhānīti antolīne anuyoge vimokkhamukhādhīnattā vimokkhādhigamassa vimokkhamukhāni tāva dassento “tisso hi…pe…
anya-e0104n9:99_12: vuccantī”ti vatvā ayañca attho pāḷito eva viññāyatīti dassento “yathāhā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n9:100_2: Paricchedaparivaṭumatoti udayabbayavasena paricchedato ceva parivaṭumato ca.
anya-e0104n9:100_3: Samanupassanatāyāti sammadeva anu anu passanāya saṁvattantīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n9:100_7: Animittāya ca dhātuyāti sabbasaṅkhāranimittavirahato “animittā”ti laddhanāmāya asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā.
anya-e0104n9:100_8: Cittasampakkhandanatāyāti paricchinditvā anulomañāṇādibhāvena sammadeva adhicittassa anupavisanatthāya.
anya-e0104n9:101_1: Saṅkhārānaṁ sabhāvavibhāvanena saṁvejiyamānaṁ cittaṁ sammāpaṭipattiyaṁ samuttejitaṁ nāma hotīti āha “manosamuttejanatāyāti cittasaṁvejanatāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n9:101_2: Mamaṁkārena attaniyasaññitassa vatthuno sāmibhūto attā paṭhamaṁ parāmasīyati,
anya-e0104n9:101_8: “sabbasaṅkhāre”tiādīni pana tīṇi vākyāni tīṇi padānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0104n9:101_9: Tenevāti aniccānupassanādīnaṁ vasena tesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ padānaṁ vuttattā eva.
anya-e0104n9:101_10: Pañhavissajjaneti “aniccato manasi karoto kathaṁ saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahantī”ti pañhassa vissajjane.
anya-e0104n9:102_1: Evaṁ vimokkhamukhāni dassetvā idāni vimokkhe dassetuṁ “katame panā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:102_4: Yassa visesato aniccānupassanā tikkhā sūrā hoti,
anya-e0104n9:102_6: “Aniccā saṅkhārā”ti hi ādito saddhāmattakena paṭipajjitvā vipassanāya ukkaṁsagatāya tarupallavādīsu viya
anya-e0104n9:102_7: maṇikanakādīsupi tesaṁ aniccataṁ sātisayaṁ paccakkhato passato “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti satthari
anya-e0104n9:102_10: Tassa aniccānupassanābahulatāya aniccākārato vuṭṭhānaṁ hotīti so “animittaṁ vimokkhaṁ paṭilabhatī”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:102_12: tappaṭipakkhato sukho nirodho”ti ca manasikāravasena nibbānassa santapaṇītasukhabhāvaṁ adhimuccanto abhiṇhaṁ
anya-e0104n9:102_14: Tato ca adhimattasamādhindriyapaṭilābhena rāgapaṇidhiyā dūrībhāvato appaṇihitavimokkhasamadhigamo hotīti vuttaṁ “dukkhato…pe…
anya-e0104n9:102_16: Vedabahuloti anattānupassanaṁ anuyuñjanto attasuññatāya nipuṇañāṇavisayattā ñāṇabahulo hoti.
anya-e0104n9:102_17: Tato ca adhimattapaññindriyapaṭilābhena mohassa dūrībhāvato suññatavimokkhasamadhigamo hotīti āha “anattato…pe…
anya-e0104n9:103_0: Yo aniccānupassanāya nimittavasena saṅkhāre pariggahetvā vipassanaṁ anuyuñjanto yattha idaṁ saṅkhāranimittaṁ sabbaso natthi,
anya-e0104n9:103_1: taṁ “animittaṁ nibbāna”nti animittākārena adhimuccanto vuṭṭhānagāminimaggena ghaṭeti.
anya-e0104n9:103_2: Tassa maggo animittato nibbānaṁ sacchikarotīti vuccatīti āha “animittākārena nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā pavatto ariyamaggo”ti.
anya-e0104n9:103_3: Svāyaṁ nibbānassa animittākāro neva maggena kato,
anya-e0104n9:103_6: Tadārammaṇatāya ca maggo animittoti vuccatīti dassento āha “animittāya dhātuyā uppannattā animitto”ti.
anya-e0104n9:103_7: Yo dukkhānupassanāvasena paṇidhiyā dūrībhāvakaraṇena appaṇihitaṁ adhimuccanto,
anya-e0104n9:103_8: yo anattānupassanāvasena attūpaladdhiyā dūrībhāvakaraṇena suññataṁ adhimuccantoti ca ādinā yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:104_2: atha kasmā abhidhamme vimokkhadvayameva āgatanti codanaṁ sandhāyāha “yaṁ panā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n9:104_4: Nippariyāyato vipassanāgamanaṁ sandhāyāti ujukameva vipassanato maggassa nāmāgamanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n9:104_5: Animittavipassanā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṁ dātuṁ na sakkoti.
anya-e0104n9:104_8: sā pana niccanimittadhuvanimittaattanimittāni ugghāṭentīpi sayaṁ nimittadhammesu eva caratīti sanimittāva hotīti.
anya-e0104n9:104_14: amaggaṅgattā attano maggassa nāmaṁ dātuṁ na sakkoti.
anya-e0104n9:105_1: suññatavimokkhena paññindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hotīti tāni ariyamaggassa aṅgattā attano maggassa nāmaṁ dātuṁ sakkonti,
anya-e0104n9:105_3: Ye pana vadanti “animittamaggo āgamanato nāmaṁ alabhantopi saguṇato ca ārammaṇato ca nāmaṁ labhatī”ti,
anya-e0104n9:105_7: Maggo hi dvīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṁ labhati sarasato ca paccanīkato cāti,
anya-e0104n9:105_10: suññatamaggo rāgādīhi suñño evāti te sarasato nāmaṁ labhanti.
anya-e0104n9:105_12: suññatamaggo attābhinivesassa evāti te paccanīkato nāmaṁ labhanti,
anya-e0104n9:105_14: niccanimittādīnaṁ vā abhāvena sarasato eva nāmaṁ labhati,
anya-e0104n9:105_16: Na hi so saṅkhāranimittārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya paṭipakkho,
anya-e0104n9:105_17: sā panassa anulomabhāve ṭhitāti sabbathāpi abhidhammapariyāyena animittamaggo na labbhati.
anya-e0104n9:106_1: Vuṭṭhānagāminī hi vipassanā yaṁ yaṁ sammasantī vuṭṭhānaṁ gacchati,
anya-e0104n9:106_2: tassa tassa vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṁ deti,
anya-e0104n9:106_3: tattha aniccato vuṭṭhahantassa maggo animitto hoti,
anya-e0104n9:106_6: tasmā suttantasaṁvaṇṇanā esāti katvā idha tayopi vimokkhā uddhaṭā.
anya-e0104n9:106_7: Yaṁ pana paṭisambhidāmagge abhinivesanimittapaṇidhimuñcanaṁ upādāya tissannampi anupassanānaṁ tadāgamanavasena
anya-e0104n9:106_9: tassa pariyāyabhāve vattabbameva natthīti dassetuṁ “vipassanāñāṇaṁ hī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:107_1: Niccato abhinivesaṁ muñcatīti “te niccā”ti niccākārato pavattamicchābhinivesaviddhaṁsanavasena,
anya-e0104n9:109_0: 771.Tesaṁ vibhāgāyāti tesaṁ yathāvuttānaṁ sattannaṁ ariyapuggalānaṁ saddhānusāriādibhāvena vibhattasabhāvatāya.
anya-e0104n9:110_4: aniccākārasallakkhaṇassa saddhābhibuddhiyā upanissayabhāvato tadanvaye magge saddhā tikkhatarā hoti,
anya-e0104n9:110_6: Sesesu sattasu ṭhānesūti paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya yāva aggaphalā sattasu ṭhānesu.
anya-e0104n9:111_5: Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya diṭṭhā honti,
anya-e0104n9:111_6: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti,
anya-e0104n9:112_4: dve sīsānī”ti vacanato natthi arahato saddhāvimuttatāti?
anya-e0104n9:112_12: so aggaphalakkhaṇepi tadanvayatāya saddhāvimuttoti paṭisambhidāmagge pariyāyena vuttoti idhāpi tatheva vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:112_15: Yathā saddhāvimuttassa sekkhassa kilesakkhayo kuṇṭhena asinā kadalicchedasadiso “no ca kho yathādiṭṭhippattassā”ti vacanato,
anya-e0104n9:112_17: Kiṁ pana nesaṁ kilesapahāne nānattaṁ atthīti? Natthi.
anya-e0104n9:112_18: Atha kasmā saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṁ na pāpuṇātīti?
anya-e0104n9:112_20: Diṭṭhippatto hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appakasirena akilamanto vikkhambhetuṁ sakkoti,
anya-e0104n9:112_24: Evañca katvā paṭhamamaggādīsu satipi indriyasamatte saddhādīnaṁ tikkhatāvacanampi samatthitaṁ hoti.
anya-e0104n9:113_2: Nanu ca aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “dve dhurānī”ti niyamitattā paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī vā siyā,
anya-e0104n9:114_1: Idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
anya-e0104n9:114_2: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
anya-e0104n9:115_5: Upacārarūpajjhānasamādhito hi sātisayaṁ arūpasamādhisamphassaṁ laddhā nibbattīti ekaccāsavaparikkhayaṁ
anya-e0104n9:115_7: apekkhitvā kāyasakkhī viya kāyasakkhīti arahā paṭisambhidāmagge vuttoti idhāpi tameva nayaṁ gahetvā arahatopi
anya-e0104n9:115_10: Nippariyāyena pana paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhī nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n9:115_15: Passaddhibahuloti ca passaddhisīsena samādhi vuttoti sātisayasamādhilābhī samathayānikova adhippeto,
anya-e0104n9:115_18: Tattha pana ekampi laddhā arahattaṁ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto eva hotīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “arūpajjhāna”micceva vuttaṁ,
anya-e0104n9:115_23: Dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto.
anya-e0104n9:116_2: gambhīrā ca atthā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti anattato manasi karoto vedabahulatā,
anya-e0104n9:116_5: Paññā hi idha “dhammo”ti adhippetā “saccaṁ dhammo dhiti cāgo”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0104n9:117_1: Yassā pāḷiyā vasena idha ariyapuggalassa saddhāvimuttādibhāvo vutto,
anya-e0104n9:118_1: “Saddhindriyassa adhimattattā saddhāvimutto”ti evamādiatthassa sādhakaṁ aparampi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:118_2: “Saddahanto vimutto”ti etena sabbathā avimuttassa saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvadassanena saddhāvimuttassa sekkhabhāvameva vibhāveti.
anya-e0104n9:119_3: phuṭṭhānantarakālameva sacchikaraṇūpāyena sacchikātabbaṁ sacchākāsīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0104n9:119_7: tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti,
anya-e0104n9:119_9: nirodhaṁ pana ārammaṇaṁ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikatova hoti.
anya-e0104n9:119_10: Tasmā so sacchikātabbaṁ yathāālocitaṁ nāmakāyena sacchākāsīti kāyasakkhīti vuccati,
anya-e0104n9:119_11: na tu vimutto ekaccānaṁ āsavānaṁ aparikkhīṇattā.
anya-e0104n9:119_12: Diṭṭhantaṁ pattoti dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṁ pattoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0104n9:119_13: Paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya hi yāva aggamaggā diṭṭhippattoti.
anya-e0104n9:119_16: Ime ca saddhāvimuttādayo tayo paramatthato apariyositañāṇakiccāti taṁ nayaṁ dassetuṁ “saddahanto vimuccatī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:120_8: Iti diṭṭhippattassa maggaphalañāṇabyāpāradassanāni imāni padānīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n9:121_1: Saddhaṁ anusaratīti āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṁ saddhaṁ anugacchati.
anya-e0104n9:121_4: Saddhāya vā anusaratīti saddhāya kāraṇabhūtāya saccapaṭivedhassa anurūpaṁ sarati gacchati,
anya-e0104n9:121_8: Ubhatobhāgavimuttoti dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimutto,
anya-e0104n9:121_11: Arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato ca nāmakāyekadesato ca vimutto,
anya-e0104n9:121_12: ariyamaggena nāmakāyato vimuttoti ubhohi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto.
anya-e0104n9:121_13: Pajānanto vimuttoti paṭhamajjhānaphassena vinā parijānanādippakārehi cattāri ariyasaccāni jānanto paṭivijjhanto
anya-e0104n9:121_14: tesaṁ kiccānaṁ matthakappattiyā niṭṭhitakiccatāya visesena muttoti vimutto.
anya-e0104n9:122_2: so adhimokkhabahulo saddhindriyassa tikkhabhāvena paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n9:122_6: tassa passaddhibahulatāya samādhindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hoti dukkhupanisāya saddhāyapi tibbatarattā,
anya-e0104n9:122_12: so vedabahulo paññindriyassa tikkhabhāvena paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe dhammānusārī eva hoti,
anya-e0104n9:122_16: aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī pana paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī vā dhammānusārī vā siyā.
anya-e0104n9:124_1: Yaṁ taṁ vimokkhamukhabhāvaṁ āpajjitvā sattaariyapuggalavibhāgāya ca paccayo hotīti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0104n9:124_8: hontīti vuttaṁ “idaṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ ekameva tīṇi nāmāni labhatī”ti.
anya-e0104n9:125_6: tāva vicinanepi udāsīnatāya ñāṇassa santānavasena pavattiṁ sandhāyāha “ajjhupekkhanaṁ santiṭṭhanā”ti.
anya-e0104n9:125_7: Evanti ajjhupekkhanākārasāmaññato “muñcitukamyatā ca sā santiṭṭhanā cā”ti vuttākārena.
anya-e0104n9:127_2: Kiccavasena pavattiṭṭhānavasenapi lokiyañāṇānaṁ upari ṭhitattā vuttaṁ “uttamabhāvaṁ pattattā”ti.
anya-e0104n9:127_5: Tañhi vipassanāya gocarakaraṇasaṅkhātena abhinivesena abhiniviṭṭhavatthunti pavuccati.
anya-e0104n9:127_6: Taṁ panetaṁ sasantatipariyāpannampi parato diṭṭhitāya “bahiddhā”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:127_7: Tadeva hi “bahiddhā sabbanimittānī”ti tattha tattha vuccati.
anya-e0104n9:127_11: tannimittaṁ asati maggabhāvanāya uppajjanakaupādinnakkhandhapavattabhāvato ca tathā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:128_2: Ajjhattaṁ abhinivisitvāti sasantatipariyāpannesu khandhesu vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā.
anya-e0104n9:128_3: “Ajjhattā vuṭṭhātī”ti idaṁ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā ajjhattadhammārammaṇattā pariyāyato vuttaṁ,
anya-e0104n9:128_7: taṁ pana ajjhattādivibhāgaṁ akatvā “yaṁ kiñci samudayadhammaṁ,
anya-e0104n9:128_8: sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhamma”nti avibhāgena vuṭṭhānagāminiyā pavattivasena veditabbaṁ,
anya-e0104n9:128_9: tayidaṁ satthu sammukhā desanānusārena ñāṇaṁ pesentassa ñāṇuttarassa sambhavatīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n9:129_0: 784.Suddhaajjhattadassanamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṁ na hoti mamaṁkāravatthunopi pariññeyyattā maggasaṅkhātaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ,
anya-e0104n9:130_0: 785.Rāsiṁ katvāti bhūtupādāyavasena duvidhaṁ antarabhedavasena anekabhedampi “ruppanaṭṭhena rūpa”nti piṇḍato gahetvā.
anya-e0104n9:130_2: evaṁ arūpe vipassanābhiniveso yebhuyyena samathayānikassa hoti.
anya-e0104n9:130_3: Abhinivesoti ca vipassanāya pubbabhāge kattabbanāmarūpaparicchedo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n9:131_1: sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhammanti kāmaṁ udayabbayapariggaṇhanaṁ abhinivesoti dassitaṁ,
anya-e0104n9:131_3: tesañca paccaye pariggahetvā saṅkhepeneva vipassanāñāṇaṁ cārento ñāṇuttaro yathānisinnova ñāṇapaṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0104n9:131_4: khippameva saccāni paṭivijjhanto ekappahārena pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti nāma.
anya-e0104n9:131_5: Aññathā ekeneva lokiyacittena pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ pariggahaparijānanādīnaṁ asambhavato.
anya-e0104n9:131_6: Na hi sanidassanasappaṭighādiṁ ekajjhaṁ ārammaṇaṁ kātuṁ sakkā.
anya-e0104n9:132_1: Ettha ca abhiniveso akāraṇaṁ vuṭṭhānameva pamāṇaṁ,
anya-e0104n9:132_2: tasmā heṭṭhā vuttavimokkhaariyapuggalavibhāgāpi vuṭṭhānavasena sambhavantīti dassetuṁ “ettha ca yopī”tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:132_3: Tattha tayopi janāti vuṭṭhānavasena bhede asatipi abhinivesavaseneva laddhaṁ bhedaṁ gahetvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:134_4: sabbaṁ vā ñāṇakiccaṁ pākaṭaṁ hoti vemajjhe ṭhatvā vibhāviyamānattā.
anya-e0104n9:136_1: Cittassa vaṅkabhāvakarānaṁ māyādīnaṁ suṭṭhu vikkhambhanena anulomassa ujukasākhāsadisatā.
anya-e0104n9:136_3: Appatiṭṭhe nibbāne patiṭṭhitattā maggañāṇassa ākāse uppatanasadisatā.
anya-e0104n9:137_0: 791.Sappavissajjanaṁ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṁ sabbasaṅkhāragataṁ vissajjitvā nibbānassa ālambanato.
anya-e0104n9:137_1: Āgatamaggaṁ olokentassa ṭhānaṁ viya maggañāṇaṁ asammohapaṭivedhavasena attanopi dassanato.
anya-e0104n9:138_5: Magge diṭṭhe maggapaṭipatti viya anulome siddhe maggo siddho evāti anulomassa maggadassanasadisatā.
anya-e0104n9:138_6: Saṅkhāranimittato nikkhantattā ādittagharato nikkhamanaṁ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:139_1: Parato na mamāyitabbato ca passitabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ “ahaṁ,
anya-e0104n9:140_3: Susānavijahanaṁ viya saṅkhārasusānaṁ vijahitvā nibbānārammaṇavasena pavattaṁ gotrabhu.
anya-e0104n9:142_2: na purimāsu viya bhayatupaṭṭhānādīsu ṭhitassa bhāyanādiākāradassanatthanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n9:142_7: Sā panettha maggasampayuttā sammāsati kāyānupassanādikiccasādhanavasena amatarasaparibhogatāya ca “amatarasaṁ kāyagatāsatibhojana”nti vuttā.
anya-e0104n9:144_0: Kapaṇāseribhāvādikaraṇena taṇhāsinehassa sītasadisatā. Maggatejanti ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṁ indaggiṁ.
anya-e0104n9:145_0: Rāgaggiādayo ekādasaggī vūpasamanti etthāti ekādasaggivūpasamaṁ, nibbānaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:146_0: Andhakāraparetoti caturaṅgasamannāgatena andhakārena kiñci attatthaṁ vā paratthaṁ vā kātuṁ asakkuṇeyyabhāvena abhibhūto.
anya-e0104n9:147_2: Heṭṭhā attanā vuttameva saṅkhārupekkhābyāpāraṁ nigamanavasena dassento “tena vutta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n9:148_1: Nirālayatāya taṇhāvasena bhavādīsu avisaṭajjhāsayo hutvā tato saṅkucitacitto patilīnabhāvena carati pavattatīti patilīnacaro,
anya-e0104n9:148_3: Saṁsāre bhayassa ikkhanatāya bhikkhuno kāyacittavivekasiddhiyā vivittamāsanaṁ bhajamānassa.
anya-e0104n9:148_7: So hi idha bhavanaṭṭhena bhavanti vutto.
anya-e0104n9:148_9: Tassa taṁ adassanaṁ sāmaggiyanti buddhādayo ariyā āhūti yojanā.
anya-e0104n9:149_6: Visesanti chasattabhāvo sattaṭṭhabhāvo pañcādibhāvoti imaṁ yathākkamaṁ bojjhaṅgādīnaṁ ariyamagge labbhamānabhedaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:149_7: Pādakajjhānanti maggassa āsannavuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhūtaṁ jhānaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:149_8: Vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtāti maggāsannāya eva vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya gocarabhūtā vipassitā.
anya-e0104n9:149_9: Puggalajjhāsayoti ubhinnaṁ bhede sati vipassakassa ajjhāsayo.
anya-e0104n9:149_10: Ettha ca paṭhamaṁ kecīti vutto tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero.
anya-e0104n9:150_0: Tesampi vādesu ayaṁ pubbabhāgavuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā niyametiyevāti veditabbā. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n9:150_1: Vipassanāniyameneva hi paṭhamattheravādepi apādakapaṭhamajjhānapādakamaggā paṭhamajjhānikāva honti,
anya-e0104n9:150_2: itare ca dutiyajjhānikādimaggā pādakajjhānavipassanāniyamehi taṁtaṁjhānikāva tato tato dutiyādipādakajjhānato
anya-e0104n9:150_5: Yathā hi maggāsannāya vipassanāya somanassasahagatatte maggassa paṭhamādijhānikatā ca upekkhāsahagatatte pañcamajjhānikatā eva ca hoti,
anya-e0104n9:150_6: tato ca bojjhaṅgādīnaṁ visesoti tesaṁ niyamane āsannakāraṇaṁ,
anya-e0104n9:150_9: Yasmā pana pādakajjhānena vinā vipassanāva imaṁ yathāvuttavisesaṁ niyametuṁ na sakkoti,
anya-e0104n9:150_13: Yathā hi pādakajjhānātikkantānaṁ aṅgānaṁ asamāpajjitukāmatāvirāgabhāvanābhūtā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā
anya-e0104n9:150_14: adhiṭṭhānabhūtena pādakajjhānena āhitavisesā maggassa bojjhaṅgādivisesaniyāmikā hoti,
anya-e0104n9:150_15: evaṁ ārammaṇabhūtasammasitajjhānātikkantānaṁ aṅgānaṁ jigucchanākāravirāgabhāvanābhūtā sammasitajjhānena āhitavisesā,
anya-e0104n9:150_16: ubhayasabbhāve ajjhāsayavasena tato aññatarena āhitavisesā ca vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā maggassa bojjhaṅgādivisesaṁ niyametīti.
anya-e0104n9:151_2: So hi jhānasinehena vipassanāya asiniddhabhāvato sukkhā lūkhā vipassanā etassāti sukkhavipassakoti vuccati.
anya-e0104n9:151_4: Tena pādakajjhānasaṅkhāresu sammasitesu vattabbameva natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n9:151_7: Na hi vuṭṭhānagāminiṁ vinā kevalaṁ pādakajjhānādayo niyamahetū diṭṭhā,
anya-e0104n9:151_8: vuṭṭhānagāminī pana pādakajjhānādīnaṁ abhāvepi sukkhavipassakādīnaṁ maggassa paṭhamajjhānikabhāvahetu,
anya-e0104n9:151_10: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṁ pākaṭataraṁ kātuṁ “tesaṁ hī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:151_13: atha kho pādakajjhānaniyamena ceva vipassanāniyamena ca.
anya-e0104n9:151_14: Tesampīti pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggānampi.
anya-e0104n9:151_15: “Āsannapadese”ti iminā vipassakena antarantarā paviṭṭhasamāpattiyā vasena ayaṁ viseso natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n9:152_3: upekkhāsahagatā ca hutvā jhānaṅgādiniyamaṁ maggassa karotīti evaṁ vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0104n9:153_1: Svāyamattho pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānupanissayehi vinā ajjhāsayamattena asijjhanaṁ upanissayena vinā
anya-e0104n9:153_3: Tattha hi yathā sotāpannāyapi paripuṇṇasaṅkappataṁ vadantena bhagavatā “yassa yassa upanissayo atthi,
anya-e0104n9:153_8: evamidhāpi yassa yassa dutiyādijhānikassa maggassa yathāvutto upanissayo atthi,
anya-e0104n9:153_11: Imasmiṁ pana vāde pādakasammasitajjhānupanissayasabbhāve ajjhāsayo ekantena hoti taṁtaṁphalūpanissayasabbhāve
anya-e0104n9:153_15: Tasmā “tatrāpi hi vipassanā”tiādinā idha vuttanayena tadattho veditabbo.
anya-e0104n9:154_1: Evaṁ vipassanāya bojjhaṅgādiniyāmikataṁ dassetvā idāni paṭipadādiniyāmikataṁ dassento “sace panāya”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n9:154_3: Sāpi hi kāmaṁ “imaṁ vāraṁ rocesu”nti ettha kalāpasammasanāvasāne udayabbayānupassanāya pavattamānāya
anya-e0104n9:154_4: uppannassa vipassanupakkilesassa tikkhattuṁ vikkhambhanena kicchatāvāraṁ dukkhāpaṭipadāti rocesunti vadanti,
anya-e0104n9:154_5: aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana “vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne vahante uppannaṁ vipassanānikantiṁ dukkhena kasirena
anya-e0104n9:154_6: kilamanto pariyādiyatī”ti vuttattā pubbabhāge muñcitukamyatādibhāvena pavattamānā saṅkhārupekkhā attano
anya-e0104n9:154_7: paṭipakkhe kicchena kasirena vikkhambhentī dukkhāpaṭipadāpakkheyeva tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0104n9:154_10: tena saddhiṁ idaṁ ñāṇaṁ ekattanayavasena ekaṁ katvā ‘ādito kilese vikkhambhayamānā’ti vutta”nti vadanti.
anya-e0104n9:154_15: Maggasaññitaṁ icchitaṭṭhānaṁ anugantvā parivasati vippavasati etthāti parivāso,
anya-e0104n9:154_18: taṁ pana sīghaṁ kurumānā khippābhiññā nāma hotīti vuttaṁ “saṇika”nti.
anya-e0104n9:154_23: Maggassa pabhavaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā nāmaṁ detīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n9:154_25: añño eva maggoti āha “attano attano maggassā”ti.
anya-e0104n9:154_26: Tena āgamanato laddhanāmena “dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā”tiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati.
anya-e0104n9:154_27: Na hi maggassa sarasato edisaṁ nāmaṁ atthi.
anya-e0104n9:155_2: Ekassa bhikkhuno catūsupi maggesu ekāva hotīti niyamo natthi calanato.
anya-e0104n9:155_4: amhākaṁ bhagavantaṁ sandhāya hontīti pana vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:155_5: Sabbesampi hi sammāsambuddhānaṁ cattāropi maggā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññāva hontīti.
anya-e0104n9:155_8: Pubbābhisaṅkhārānurūpañhi maggo paccekaṁ chandādhipateyyo vā hoti vīriyādīsu aññatarādhipateyyo vā,
anya-e0104n9:156_1: Pubbe vuttappakārato sātisayaṁ katvā anavasesato maggassa nāmalābhe kāraṇaṁ dassetuṁ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:157_3: tathāpi sarasādayo paccekaṁ nāmalābhassa kāraṇamevāti dassetuṁ “sarasena vā”tiādinā sabbattha aniyamattho vā-
anya-e0104n9:157_5: Te ca asaṅkarato dassetuṁ “sace hī”tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:157_10: maggakattukāya vuṭṭhānakiriyāya ekantikahetubhūtā saṅkhārupekkhā phalūpacārena “vuṭṭhātī”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n9:157_11: Yasmā vā saṅkhārupekkhāti vuṭṭhānagāminiyā etaṁ upalakkhaṇaṁ,
anya-e0104n9:157_18: Idaṁ sarasato nāmaṁ nāmāti idaṁ nimittādivirahato animittaṁ appaṇihitaṁ suññatanti tividhampi maggassa sabhāvato siddhanāmaṁ nāma.
anya-e0104n9:158_1: So ca kho pubbabhāgamaggena saddhiṁ ekaṁ katvā vutto ekattanayena.
anya-e0104n9:158_2: Idaṁ paccanīkato nāmaṁ nāmāti idaṁ niccanimittādīnaṁ paṇidhiyā,
anya-e0104n9:158_3: attasaññāya ca pahānavasena laddhaṁ maggassa animittādināmattayaṁ paṭipakkhato siddhanāmaṁ nāma.
anya-e0104n9:159_5: Idamassa saguṇato nāmanti idaṁ rāgādivivittattā rūpanimittādipaṇidhiādiabhāvavasena assa maggassa saguṇato siddhaṁ nāmaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:160_5: Idamassa ārammaṇato nāmanti yathā sukhārammaṇaṁ rūpaṁ “sukha”nti vuccati,
anya-e0104n9:160_6: evaṁ suññatādināmassa nibbānassa ārammaṇakaraṇato idaṁ assa maggassa suññatādibhedaṁ ārammaṇato siddhaṁ nāmaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:161_1: Anattānupassanā attasuññatāya diṭṭhattā sarasato suññatā nāma.
anya-e0104n9:161_4: Idaṁ pana maggassa animittanāmaṁ na abhidhammapariyāyena labbhati.
anya-e0104n9:161_9: saraseneva ca nāmalābhe sabbamaggānaṁ suññatādibhāvoti vavatthānaṁ na siyā.
anya-e0104n9:161_10: Tasmā abhidhamme satipi dvīhipi kāraṇehi animittanāmalābhe paccanīkatova nāmavavatthānakaraṇaṁ gayhatīti tadabhāvā na labbhati.
anya-e0104n9:161_11: Atha vā na labbhatīti aññanirapekkhehi saguṇārammaṇehi na labbhati.
anya-e0104n9:161_14: Paccanīkañhi vavatthānakaraṇaṁ anapekkhitvā kevalassa sarasassa nāmahetubhāvo abhidhamme natthi,
anya-e0104n9:161_16: Tasmā attābhinivesapaṇidhipaṭipakkhavipassanānulomā maggā satipi sarasantare paccanīkasahitena sarasena nāmaṁ labhanti.
anya-e0104n9:161_17: Animittamaggassa pana vipassanā nimittapaṭipakkhā na hoti,
anya-e0104n9:161_18: sayaṁ nimittaggahaṇato nimittaggahaṇānivāraṇāti tadanulomo maggopi na nimittassa paṭipakkho.
anya-e0104n9:161_21: tasmā vijjamānopi saraso vavatthānakarapaccanīkābhāvā abhidhamme animittanāmadāyako na gayhatīti.
anya-e0104n9:161_23: aniccānupassanānulomo maggo abhidhamme asaṅgahito siyāti? Na,
anya-e0104n9:161_26: Suttante pana pariyāyadesanattā saguṇārammaṇamattenapi nāmaṁ gayhatīti āha “suttantapariyāyena labbhatī”ti.
anya-e0104n9:161_29: Āgamanavasenapi maggassa animittanāmaṁ labbhatiyevāti dassetuṁ “tatrā hī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:164_1: Tasmā tathābhūtā bhāvanāvisesena kiccato adhimattatāya balavatarā nibbattati.
anya-e0104n9:164_4: Sūpaṭṭhitāti tikkhataratāya ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvena suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā sati hoti.
anya-e0104n9:164_5: Susamāhitanti passaddhisukhānaṁ sātisayatāya suṭṭhu samāhitaṁ ārammaṇe sammadeva ṭhapitaṁ appitaṁ viya hoti.
anya-e0104n9:164_6: Tikkhatarāti anulomañāṇuppattiyā paccayo bhavituṁ samatthabhāvena sātisayaṁ tikkhā sūrā.
anya-e0104n9:164_9: sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṁ otaratīti aniccādīsu ekenākārena sammasantī sattakkhattuṁ pavattitvā bhijjantī bhavaṅgaṁ
anya-e0104n9:164_10: otiṇṇā nāma hoti tato paraṁ bhavaṅgassa vāroti katvā.
anya-e0104n9:164_14: Āvaṭṭetvāti nivattetvā cittassa bhavaṅgavasena vattituṁ adatvā.
anya-e0104n9:164_17: Kiriyamanodhātuyā hi bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite kiriyamayacittapavattivipākacittuppattiyā savīcikā santarā,
anya-e0104n9:164_18: na evaṁ manodvārāvajjanenāti vuttaṁ “avīcikaṁ cittasantatiṁ anuppabandhamāna”nti.
anya-e0104n9:164_19: Tathevāti yathā atītāsu dvattiṁsajavanavīthīsu saṅkhārupekkhā “aniccā”ti vā “dukkhā”ti vā “anattā”ti vā saṅkhāre ārammaṇamakāsi, tatheva.
anya-e0104n9:165_0: Ayañca nayo kāmaṁ maggavīthiyaṁ paṭhamajavanassa paṭisaṅkharaṇaṭṭho,
anya-e0104n9:165_2: tatiyassa heṭṭhimuparimānaṁ anulomaṭṭho ca yuttoti vutto,
anya-e0104n9:165_3: tathāpi sabbesampi imā samaññā sambhavantīti dassetuṁ “avisesena panā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:165_12: Idāni anulomañāṇassa tadubhayakiccānulomaṁ vitthārato dassetuṁ “tañhī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:165_13: Tattha anulomañāṇaṁ saccapaṭicchādakamohakkhandhādīnaṁ sātisayaṁ vidhamanena lokiyañāṇesu ukkaṁsapariyantagataṁ,
anya-e0104n9:165_14: tato eva heṭṭhā nibbattitaudayabbayañāṇādīnampi kiccaṁ paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena atthato sādhentameva hutvā pavattati,
anya-e0104n9:165_15: tathāpavattamānañca tesaṁ kiccaṁ anulomentaṁ viya hotīti āha “udayabbayavantānaṁ…pe…
anya-e0104n9:165_17: Tattha “bhayato upaṭṭhita”nti imināpi ārammaṇasīsena ñāṇabyāpārameva vadati sappaṭibhayānaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ yathāsabhāvadassanadīpanato.
anya-e0104n9:165_18: Sesesu pana sattasupi ṭhānesu ñāṇabyāpārova dassito.
anya-e0104n9:165_19: Yasmā etaṁ anulomañāṇaṁ aniccādīsu aññataralakkhaṇavaseneva saṅkhāre ārabbha pavattati,
anya-e0104n9:165_21: Tāya paṭipattiyāti yā sā anulomañāṇassa thūlathūlasaccapaṭicchādakasaṁkilesavikkhambhanapaṭipatti, tāya.
anya-e0104n9:165_22: Na hi anulomañāṇe tathā anuppanne gotrabhuñāṇaṁ nibbānaṁ ālambituṁ sakkoti,
anya-e0104n9:166_0: Vuttamatthaṁ opammena pākaṭataraṁ kātuṁ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:166_1: Tattha aṭṭhannaṁ vohārikamahāmattānaṁ agatigamanaṁ pahāya taṁtaṁvinicchayakaraṇaṁ viya aṭṭhannaṁ ñāṇānaṁ
anya-e0104n9:166_3: rañño majjhattabhāvo viya anulomañāṇassa purimapacchimadhammakoṭṭhāsassa anukūlatā.
anya-e0104n9:169_1: Kiñci asaṅkhatārammaṇampi ñāṇaṁ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā ekasaṅgahanti katvā “saṅkhārārammaṇāyā”ti visesanaṁ kataṁ.
anya-e0104n9:169_2: Tañhi visesato vuṭṭhānaṁ ariyamaggaṁ gacchati upetīti vuṭṭhānagāminīti vattabbataṁ labhati.
anya-e0104n9:169_4: Asammohatthanti tattha tattha sutte pariyāyantarehi āgatāya sammohābhāvatthaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:169_5: Suttasaṁsandanāti suttānaṁ tesaṁ tesaṁ suttapadānaṁ anusandānaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:170_0: Ye lokiye saṅkhāre ārabbha anulomapariyosānā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā pavattati,
anya-e0104n9:170_1: taṁsannissitā tappaṭibaddhā taṇhā tehi vinā appavattanato tammayā nāma,
anya-e0104n9:170_29: sā pana taṁtaṁjhānasahagatavedanupekkhā ca tadārammaṇavipassanupekkhā cāti vadanti.
anya-e0104n9:171_0: Nibbidāti vuṭṭhānagāminī. Tattha hi sutte virajjatīti maggakiccamāha, vimuccatīti phalakiccaṁ.
anya-e0104n9:172_1: Tattha dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṁ vuṭṭhānagāminīti vuttā dhammaṭṭhitiyaṁ paṭiccasamuppāde asammuyhanavasena pavattanato.
anya-e0104n9:173_2: pubbe pana “saññaggaṁ phusatī”ti vuttattā āha “saññagganti vuttā”ti.
anya-e0104n9:174_1: Samudāyesu hi pavattā vohārā avayavesupi pavattantīti.
